title: MCA Notification Effective Date for Section 396 Extended to February 16, 2026!
content:
# MCA Notification Effective Date for Section 396 Extended to February 16, 2026!

Ek important update hai! Government ne Companies Act, 2013 ke Section 396 ke तहत एक notification ki effective date extend karne ka announce kiya hai.

Yeh extension Regional Directors (RDs) aur Registrars of Companies (RoCs) ki establishment aur unke jurisdiction se related hai. Pehle yeh provisions January 1, 2026 se effective hone wale the.

**Key Details:**
*   **Section:** Companies Act, 2013 ke Section 396.
*   **Old Effective Date:** January 1, 2026.
*   **New Effective Date:** February 16, 2026.
*   **Amending Notification Date:** December 30, 2025.
*   **Notification Reference:** F. No. 11/1/2024-Ad.II-MCA.
*   **Original Notification Details:** The Central Government had earlier issued notification S.O. 4850(E) (or S.O. 4852(E)) dated October 23, 2025 (published October 24, 2025), regarding the establishment of RDs/RoCs. Ab issi notification ke paragraph 2 mein "1st January, 2026" ko "16th February, 2026" se substitute kiya gaya hai.

Toh, ab naye Regional Director framework aur RoC arrangements February 16, 2026 se operational honge.

## Read the Official Document
*   [Download the Official Notification/Circular here](https://www.mca.gov.in/content/mca/global/en/home/acts-rules/notifications.html)

*Published on: 6 January 2026*
